thread.title: What's coming to 'ACC Gridiron LIVE' for Week 8
thread.title_full: What's coming to 'ACC Gridiron LIVE' for Week 8

title: What's coming to 'ACC Gridiron LIVE' for Week 8
text:
What's coming to 'ACC Gridiron LIVE' for Week 8 FOX Sports South 
Oct 19, 2015 at 10:45a ET + FOX Sports South FOX Sports South Share This Story Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 10:51a ET 
ACC Gridiron LIVE continues Wednesday, Oct. 21 with a Week 8 installment that breaks down the top storylines and more from throughout the league. 
Emmy Award-winning James Bates, former NFLers Ovie Mughelli and Takeo Spikes and former coach Tommy Bowden will talk all things ACC football throughout the season. The show airs Wednesdays at 10 p.m. ET on FOX Sports South throughout the season and is streaming on FOX Sports GO. Please check local listings for availability in your area, or visit here . 
This week, our crew profiles Duke quarterback Thomas Sirk , who has led the Blue Devils to a 5-1 record, and Bowden breaks down how Virginia Tech can beat Duke in his "Ford Keys To The Game." 
Plus, North Carolina coach Larry Fedora and Virginia coach Mike London are interviewed prior to renewing the ACC's oldest rivalry. Spikes will also show how the Tar Heels ' defense has made improvements on the touchscreen monitor. 
Lastly, in this week's Fan Duel Huddle Up, our crew answers the question: Has Georgia Tech's streak of 18 consecutive bowl appearances come to an end? 
The show will feature in-depth breakdowns of the following games: 
— No. 6 Clemson at Miami 
— No. 9 Florida State at Georgia Tech 
— No. 23 Duke at Virginia Tech
